segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that catches my eye is the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's absolutely overflowing, water pouring over the edge and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see a widening puddle forming right at the woman's feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing there, calmly drying a plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is entirely fixed on that dish, as if nothing else exists.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredible how oblivious she is to the flood around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the water soaking her dress or splashing her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause some serious water damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the tidy garden outside the window is quite stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how serene she looks while disaster unfolds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn her about the impending mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
